title: DI Input/Output Value
description: (DRAFT) -- Represents an I/O value used by Runnable Models in this CDM, for OpenDI-compliant software. I/O Values can be read or set by Runnable Models, and interactively in Diagrams, via Controls. A single I/O Value can be referenced in multiple Runnable Models and Controls.

meta.title: Asset Metadata
meta.description: Metadata shared by all DI Assets

data.title: Raw value data
data.description: Stores the current data associated with this I/O value. Data can be any JSON-accepted type.
